page.title: 06ELECTRICITY
page.content: We use a lot of electricty these days.At home we use electricity for various things.Televisions,cookers, hoovers and so one all we use electric.At a press of a switch we have electric light from bulbs in the ceiling.Bulbs are glass with a little piece of metal inside.We have electric lights outside as well as inside.We have an electric meter to show how much electricty we use.We have to pay for the electric we use. Electricty is produced at power stations and comes to our homes along over-head or underground wires.All around the houses there are electric sockets so that we can plug our electric implements in.
